data.eml:eml: Aprostocetus chilophagae new species (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) from South Dakota, with taxonomic notes on A. bromi (Kostjukov) and A. nebraskensis (Girault)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Johnson, Paul J., Yefremova, Zoya A., López, Juan Manuel Perilla, Yegorenkova, Ekaterina N. (2018): Aprostocetus chilophagae new species (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) from South Dakota, with taxonomic notes on A. bromi (Kostjukov) and A. nebraskensis (Girault). Zootaxa 4514 (4): 473-486, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.4.2
